QuestData.Title: Fight Fire and Water and Air with...
QuestData.Description: Did ye hear the blatherin' idiot while ye were up there? That's none other than Haethen Kaul, their leader.$B$BThe man's gone daft with power. He's pullin' it straight from them bound elementals, makin' him nigh invincible.$B$BThe only thing I can think of to get ye into proper shape fer a fight with him is fer ye to first kill all o' them elementals, gettin' their wards. That should protect ye from Haethen's spells.$B$BWell, most o' them anyway.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: First, get the fire, water, and air wards. Then slay him!
QuestData.LogDescription: Acquire the Fire, Water, and Air Wards, and then slay Haethen Kaul.
QuestData.CompletionText: Yer gonna have ta do better than that, $g laddie : missy;!$B$BNow get back up there an' finish the job or do I have ta go an' do it myself?
QuestData.RewardText: That's the ol' spirit! One less nasty in this world that the little ones will have ta worry about when they go ta sleep at night.$B$BNot ta mention that we won't have ta be worrying about him none no more neither!$B$BNow let's see here. I think we have somethin' in our crates that'll make a fittin' reward fer ya.
